reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a perfect little black dress that fits well and is comfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress!!!! I bought the white one to wear for my bridal shower and loved it so much that I bought it in black also! The fit of the dress is very flattering. The material is nice and has some stretch to it so it’s very comfortable. I love the slit. It shows just enough leg and the neckline is so cute too how it’s slanted. I’m 125 lbs and 5’ 3” and size small fit perfect! Read more
items.author: Donna Benham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Flattering!
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress! Fit my curves in all the right places and was so flattering! The stretchy material made it so breathable and comfortable. Great quality! Read more
items.author: Kelsey Young

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Flattering!
items.body: SUPER flattering with a perfect length for us shorter girls! I LOVE the asymmetrical look and the leg slit keeps it sexy without going too far in that direction, esp as a 40+ woman. ;-) The length is PERFECT--not too long, not too short. I love the forgiving stretch and fit; I didn't even need a bra. Note: The reason I didn't need a bra is because the chest is pretty tight; I'd say in runs a bit small in the chest area, so size up if you're busty or broad chested. I got a size xs and it fit perfectly on my 5' 3", 112 lb frame. I ordered a ton of dresses from Nordstrom that were far more expensive, and this is the dress I ended up keeping. Read more
items.author: bonapulka

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wedding guest dress
items.body: This dress is comfortable and flattering, can be dressed up or down. I wore this to a wedding and was given lots of compliments. I will say the color is a brighter blue in person where the photos here seem a bit more of a dusty blue. The dress traveled well in my suitcase and is not easily wrinkled. I’m 5’ 6 140lbs and ordered a medium and it was a good fit. Read more
items.author: The Steadmans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering fit
items.body: So stylish, heavy weight, not see-through, good quality, and wrinkle resistant. Great for cocktail attire and for weddings. I will be wearing it in a couple weeks for a wedding. Very flattering fit! True to color in image. Read more
items.author: Sandy P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size!
items.body: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Perfect little black dress! I absolutely love this dress! The fit is super flattering — it hugs in all the right places without being too tight. The material feels soft and has a nice stretch, and the adjustable straps make it easy to get the right fit. The side slit adds just the right amount of elegance and makes it perfect for a night out or a cocktail party. I paired it with nude heels and simple jewelry, and it looked amazing. Definitely a staple piece every woman should have in her closet! Read more
items.author: Jaelyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't Love the Color in Person
items.body: This dress fit, I just didn't love the color as much in person. (5’5 | 133 lbs | Size 4 / Small) Read more
items.author: Chelsea K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: Very comfortable, stretchy, and the slit isn’t too high. Definitely can be dressed up or down. Good quality for the price - haven’t worn it yet but planning on wearing it to a wedding. It’s also not see-through or anything, the material is somewhat thick but lightweight which is nice. It’s flattering as well. Read more
items.author: Rebecca W

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Cocktail Split Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Cocktail Split Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Velvet Burgendy, Grey Blue, Velvet Dark Green, Hot Pink, Black, Burgendy, Navy Blue, Velvet Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Pink, White, Velvet Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
